00029 // This class is used to route equalizer log into the omega log system.
00030 class EqualizerLogStreamBuf: public std::streambuf
00031 {
00032 protected:
00033         virtual int overflow ( int c = EOF )
00034         {
00035                 if(c == '\n')
00036                 {
00037                         omsg(myStringStream.str().c_str());
00038                         myStringStream.str(""); 
00039                 }
00040                 else
00041                 {
00042                         myStringStream << (char)c;
00043                 }
00044                 return 0;
00045         }
00046 private:
00047     std::ostringstream myStringStream;
00048 };
00049
